root: ^Hello Reginald! I am Darryl and this is my wife Shannon
^We are getting up there in age and we are looking for a home to retire in
^We have already sold our previous home, so we do have a lofty budget of $3M
^As we have already retired, we are looking to dive deeper into our hobbies
^Shannon loves to take care of gardens and recently we have gotten into the idea of farming
^She always jokes that we'd be great farmers
^We can't be too on the outskirts however, we do have family living in the city and we don't too far away from out grandbabies!
^We are also quite religious as well and would love to be situated in an area that is close by to a church
^Another reason we don't want to be secluded is that we do value a social life
^Areas that are also older in age that have walking groups, bingo nights would honestly be fantastic!

Good: ^Perfect, I guess we will let you get to work then Reginald!
